social security.translation[0].definitio: government money that is paid to people who are unemployed, old, ill etc
be/live on social security (=be receiving money from the government)
social security.translation[1].definitio: a US government programme into which workers must make regular payments, and which pays money regularly to old people and people who are unable to work
social security.translation[2].definitio: government money that is paid to people who are unemployed, old, or ill
Are you receiving social security benefits?
Cutbacks in social security payments were implemented on April 1st.
a system of insurance run by the US government, into which workers make regular payments, and which provides money when they are unable to work, especially because they are old
spending on programs such as Social Security and Medicare
I need your name, age, and Social Security number.
